---
category: news
title: "Delta Robots Feed the Need for Speed"
excerpt: "End-of-arm tooling plays a critical role in achieving fast speeds. Delta robots require very lightweight tooling with fast actuation, due to their small payload capacity and fast cycle rates. Simple vacuum tooling with suction cups is the most popular type of end-effector."
